bio: General enthusiast, shadowy super SVGs, currently product design at Dune.
contributionDescription: I created an onchain-animated-svg NFT celebrating the launch of Zora chain using OP's Sunny character as a base for a Zora-themed character, celebrating and reiterating the Superchain connection. This hyped the Zora-chain launch, and as soon as minting on Base was supported, I created a similar Base-themed character. I call them Superfriends.

contributionLinks.description: optimism-radiating zora-chain NFT celebrating Zora's new chain
optimism-radiating base-chain NFT celebrating Base chain

impactDescription:
These NFTs expand the Sunny-verse with optimistic characters who:
1. Celebrate the launch of new op-stack chains
2. Give people an delightful way to mint their first Zora-chain and Base-chain NFT
3. Spread the OP brand and meme of Sunny, the unofficial (I believe!) optimism mascot
4. As onchain SVGs, this animated art can be code-inspected, copied and riffed on

Most importantly, the art and the description text present the work and the chains they're  deployed on as territory for wholesome enthusiasm, onchain creativity, and a positive message to builders and minters: You got this! You can do it! Go get it! Stay optimistic!
pwCategorySuggestions: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Blockchain Gaming, Community Building
